gap: 2rem; } #top-ra>li { position: relative; padding-left: 55px; width: 100%; } .avatar-image-container { position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; width: 40px; padding-bottom: 40px; height: 40px; border-radius: 4rem; flex-shrink: 0; display: block; overflow: hidden; } .avatar-image-container img { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .comment-header { display: flex; /* flex-wrap: wrap; */ align-items: center; margin-bottom: 8px; gap: 1rem; } .user { font-style:normal; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; } .datetime, .datetime a { color: var(--text-base); white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis; } .comment-content { color: #ccc; margin-bottom: .75rem; overflow: hidden; } .icon.user.blog-author { display: none; } .comment-actions.secondary-text { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; } .comment-reply { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: .3rem; } .comment-reply::before { content: ''; background-position: -42px 0; background-image: var(--sprites); background-size: 280px 280px; width: 14px; height: 14px; display: block; opacity: .6; } .sc-header span { font-size: 13px; } .comment-replybox-single { margin-left: -60px; margin-bottom: 15px; } .hidden {display:none} .sc-header label:before{content:attr(data-text);margin:0 6px;opacity:.7;} .sc-header label{cursor:pointer;margin-left:14px;align-items:center;font-size:11px;} .cmAll:checked~.sc-header label:before{content:attr(data-new);} .cmAll:checked~.comment-thread ol#top-ra{flex-direction:column-reverse;} .thread-chrome.thread-expanded{list-style:none;border-left:1px solid var(--border);padding-left:20px;position:relative;margin-top: 15px;} .comment-block { margin-bottom: 10px; function checkStreamingParam() { if (window.location.hash === '#streaming') { document.querySelector('.watch-wrap').classList.remove('d-none'); document.querySelector('.anime-servers').classList.remove('d-none'); document.querySelector('.infor .heading .btn-play').classList.add('d-none'); document.querySelector('.content-split').classList.add('in-watch'); document.querySelector('#main_area').classList.add('anime-single');
var posterSplit = document.querySelector('.poster-split'); if (posterSplit) { posterSplit.remove(); } } }
if (typeof episodes === 'undefined' || episodes.length === 0) { const playButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.btn-play, .stick-play'); playButtons.forEach(button => button.remove());
}
const playButton = document.querySelector('.btn-play'); const stickPlayButton = document.querySelector('.stick-play');
function handlePlayClick(e) { e.preventDefault(); window.location.hash = '#streaming'; checkStreamingParam(); }
if (playButton) { playButton.addEventListener('click', handlePlayClick); }
if (stickPlayButton) { stickPlayButton.addEventListener('click', handlePlayClick); }
checkStreamingParam();

function getSlider(e) { let entry = script1.getFeed(e); let html = '<div id="top-slider" class="swiper swiper-initialized swiper-horizontal swiper-backface-hidden">'; html += '<div class="swiper-wrapper">';
entry.forEach(item => { let entry = document.createElement("div"); entry.innerHTML = item.content; let n = entry.querySelector(".synopsis"), x = entry.querySelector("#dirilis"), synopsis = n ? (n.innerText.length > 200 ? n.innerText.slice(0, 200) + "..." : n.innerText) : "Tidak Ada Sinopsis"; dirilis = x ? x.innerText.slice(0, 20) : "Unknown";
let scriptTag = entry.querySelector("script");
let cover = ""; // Deklarasi variabel aired
// Attempt to extract aired date and duration from the script tag if present if (scriptTag) { try { const scriptContent = scriptTag.textContent;
// Extract aired date and duration using regex const coverMatch = scriptContent.match(/cover:\s*['"]([^'"]+)['"]/);
// Use optional chaining and destructuring cover = coverMatch?.[1] || item.image.replace(/\.(gif|jpe?g|tiff?|png|bmp)$/, '.webp'); } catch (error) { console.error("Error ya:", error); } }
let type = item.label.find(s => kaiTipe.some(l => l === s)) || ""; let status = item.label.find(s => kaiStatus.some(l => l === s)) || ""; let eps = item.label.find(s => regexEpisode.test(s)) || ""; let dub = item.label.find(s => /Dub\s\d+/.test(s)) || "";
// Generate HTML for dub and episode let dubHTML = dub ? `<div class="item item-flex item-dub"> <div class="sp-icon sp-12 sp-light sp-icon-dub"></div> <div class="name">${dub.replace(/Dub|dub/g, '')}</div> </div>` : ''; let subHTML = eps ? `<div class="item item-flex item-sub"> <div class="sp-icon sp-12 sp-light sp-icon-sub"></div> <div class="name">${eps.replace(/Episode|Ep/g, '')}</div> </div>` : '';
let g = item.label.filter(label => kaiGenre.some(entry => entry === label)).map(label => `<a href='/search/label/${label}'>${label}</a>`).join(' ');
html += `<div class="swiper-slide"> <div class="anime-poster"><img class="lazy" height="600" width="900" class="" alt="${item.title}" src="${cover.replace(/\.(gif|jpe?g|tiff?|png|bmp)$/, '.webp')}" loading="lazy"/></div> <div class="anime-detail delay"> <div class="detail"> <div class="e-detail"> <div class="others"> <div class="item item-quality">${type}</div> ${subHTML} ${dubHTML} </div> </div> <h3 class="anime-name text-sort"><a href="${item.link}">${item.title}</a></h3> <div class="description text-sort">${synopsis}</div> <div class="flex-grow-1"></div> <div class="buttons"><a class="btn btn-primary" href="${item.link}"> <div class="flex-in"> <div class="name">Watch Now</div> <div class="base-icon icon-16"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none"> <path opacity="0.4" d="M3.33325 10H16.6666" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path> <path d="M11.6667 5L16.6667 10L11.6667 15" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path> </svg></div> </div> </a></div> </div> </div> </div>`; });
html += '</div><div class="slider-controls"><div class="button-prev type-button"><div class="base-icon"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M15 18L9 12L15 6" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></div></div><div class="swiper-pagination"></div><div class="button-next type-button"><div class="base-icon"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M9 18L15 12L9 6" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg></div></div></div>'; // Close swiper-wrapper html += '</div>'; // Close swiper-container
document.querySelector('.tf-slider').innerHTML = html;
var swiper = new Swiper('.tf-slider #top-slider', { autoplay: { delay: 5000, disableOnInteraction: false, }, loop: true, pagination: { el: '.swiper-pagination', clickable: true, }, navigation: { nextEl: '.button-next', // Custom class for the next button prevEl: '.button-prev', // Custom class for the prev button }, }); }
